description: Scenario forced experiment with prescribed land surface climatology derived from "present climate" conditions (1980-2014).  The experiment is comprised of transient coupled atmosphere-ocean simulations in which a selection of land surface characteristics is prescribed rather than interactively calculated in the model.  The "climatological" land surface forcing is calculated as the mean annual cycle in the period 1980-2014 from the historical GCM simulations. Additional ensemble members are requested with tier 2 priority.
keywords: LS3MIP, Tier 1, Tier 2, Historical Scenario, Prescribed Land 1980-2014
long_name: prescribed land surface climatology derived from present climate
rationale: Diagnose land-climate feedback including ocean response. To diagnose the role of land-atmosphere feedback at climate time scales.
